intro: Burtonia subulata, commonly known as the slender burtonia, is a flowering plant native to Madagascar. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered flowers that are typically white or pale yellow. Its leaves are narrow and pointed, giving it a distinctive appearance. Burtonia subulata is often found in humid, shaded environments within its native habitat.
